title: Tell me about your favorite coffee shop. Why do you like going there?

korean: 우리 집 근처에 단골 카페가 있는데, 거기 정말 자주 가.
작은 개인 카페인데, 분위기가 아늑하고 조용해서 좋아.
무엇보다 커피 맛이 정말 좋아서 계속 찾게 돼.
사장님이 직접 로스팅한 원두를 쓰는데, 향이 정말 좋아.
메뉴도 다양하고, 계절마다 특별한 메뉴가 나와.
디저트도 맛있는데, 특히 치즈케이크가 진짜 맛있어.
조명이 따뜻한 느낌이라 저녁에 가면 더 좋아.
와이파이도 잘 터지고 콘센트도 많아서 작업하기 좋아.
주말엔 사람이 좀 많긴 한데, 그래도 가고 싶어.
나만의 아지트 같은 느낌이라 계속 가게 돼.
english: There's a café I go to regularly near my house, and I, like, go there really often.
It's a small independent café, and I like it because the atmosphere is cozy and quiet.
The interior is vintage style, so it's unique and pretty.
Most of all, the coffee tastes really good, so I keep, you know, going back.
The owner uses beans they roast themselves, and the aroma is really nice.
The menu is varied, and special menus come out each season.
The desserts are also delicious, especially the cheesecake is, like, really good.
The lighting has a warm feeling, so it's even better when I go in the evening.
The WiFi works well and there are many outlets, so it's good for working.
On weekends, there are a bit more people, but I still want to go.
The owner is kind and you can see many regulars too.
It feels like my own hideout, so I keep going.
